Class netscape.constructor.TargetProxyManager 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----netscape.constructor.TargetProxyManager
public class TargetProxyManager
extends Object
implements Codable
This class manages the hashtable of names for the TargetProxy objects. The TargetProxy objects ask this object if there is a real object to replace them during unarching. This object automatically adds the Application.application() and TargetChain.applicationChain() objects to the hashtable under special names.

APPLICATION_TARGET_PROXY_KEY
Key used in the TargetProxy Hashtable to map the Application.application() object into the TargetProxies.
NEVER_REPLACE_KEY
Never replace any TargetProxy object.
SINGLE_TARGET_PROXY_KEY
If targets() contains a value for this key, then all requests from targetNamed() other than application and TargetChain will return the object with this key.
TARGET_CHAIN_TARGET_PROXY_KEY
Key used in the TargetProxy Hashtable to map the TargetChain.applicationChain() object into the TargetProxies.

TargetProxyManager()

Decodes the object.

targets()
The hashtable of names to real application objects

SINGLE_TARGET_PROXY_KEY 
 public static final String SINGLE_TARGET_PROXY_KEY
If targets() contains a value for this key, then all requests from targetNamed() other than application and TargetChain will return the object with this key. This is normally only used by Plan, when it has been asked to unarchiveObjects() with a single Target value.

APPLICATION_TARGET_PROXY_KEY 
 public static final String APPLICATION_TARGET_PROXY_KEY
Key used in the TargetProxy Hashtable to map the Application.application() object into the TargetProxies.

TARGET_CHAIN_TARGET_PROXY_KEY 
 public static final String TARGET_CHAIN_TARGET_PROXY_KEY
Key used in the TargetProxy Hashtable to map the TargetChain.applicationChain() object into the TargetProxies.

NEVER_REPLACE_KEY 
 public static final String NEVER_REPLACE_KEY
Never replace any TargetProxy object. Return null for all cases. Useful in supressing the replacement behavior.

TargetProxyManager 
 public TargetProxyManager()

targets 
 public Hashtable targets()
The hashtable of names to real application objects

setTargets 
 public void setTargets(Hashtable newTargets)
Copies the contents of newTargets into the internal Hashtable. All elements in newTargets MUST implement the Target iterface. Elements that do not, will not be copied into the internal Hashtable. A warning message will print on System.err.

targetNamed 
 public Target targetNamed(String name)
Returns the object called name. If targets() does not contain APPLICATION_TARGET_PROXY_KEY and Application.application() implements Target, it will be returned. If targets() does not contain TARGET_CHAIN_TARGET_PROXY_KEY and TargetChain.applicationChain() will be returned. If targets() contains SINGLE_TARGET_PROXY_KEY, it will be returned for all other requests.

describeClassInfo 
 public void describeClassInfo(ClassInfo info)
Describes the coding info.
